children.title: Responsive Web Design Certificate
children.description: freeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design Certificate. Covers HTML, CSS, Flexbox, Grid, and Responsive Design. Click "Visit" to verify certificate on freeCodeCamp.org.

children.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
children.description: freeCodeCamp's JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certificate. Covers JavaScript, ES6, Regular Expressions, Debugging, Data Structures, and Algorithms. Click "Visit" to verify certificate on freeCodeCamp.org.

children.title: Front End Development Libraries (React) Certificate
children.description: freeCodeCamp's Front End Development Libraries Certificate. Covers Bootstrap, jQuery, Sass, React, and Redux. Click "Visit" to verify certificate on freeCodeCamp.org.

children.title: Data Visualisation (D3) Certificate
children.description: freeCodeCamp's Data Visualisation Certificate. Covers D3, JSON APIs, AJAX and fetch. Click "Visit" to verify certificate on freeCodeCamp.org.

children.title: Your Website
children.description: Need a website or a refresh? I'm happy to help, at very competitive prices (free)! If you're interested, click here to contact me.

children.title: additionalram .com
children.description: AdditionalRAM's personal website. It's the website you're looking at right now.

children.title: SIMPHASE
children.description: A clone of my father's website, simphase.de

children.title: TILTED GAMES
children.description: This website is an example for a used video game thrift store

children.title: DOM Simple List
children.description: First DOM project ever. Add and remove stuff from a simple list, hide and search.

children.title: DOM Simple Calculator
children.description: Very simple calculator app using eval() function.

children.title: DOM Simple To-Do
children.description: To Do project app, can add lists, items and checks. Saves using local storage.

children.title: DOM Random Quote Generator
children.description: Gets a random quote from api.quotable.io and displays using the DOM.

children.title: DOM Tic Tac Toe
children.description: Tic Tac Toe game between two players, bot implementation unfinished

children.title: DOM Weather
children.description: Uses api.open-meteo.com to get hourly weather for 3 days.

children.title: Money Wars
children.description: Mobile multiplayer strategy turn-based game (unfortunately) made with Unity C# and Unity Netcode for GameObjects. Unfinished.

children.title: Mini World Adventures
children.description: A quite traditional top-down Action-Adventure game with a nice story.

children.title: AddCEF
children.description: A decent attempt at automating porting of web applications to Windows, made using Python, Nuitka, CEF, and miniweb

children.title: Five Periods at Timeler's
children.description: An Undertale style turn based combat game. Based on my maths teacher, made as a joke.
